The statement from Tamara Holder: a liberal Fox News Contributor, claiming that Republicans have 2 percent of the Muslim vote.
The report: American Muslim Voters and the 2008 Election" by the Council on American-Islamic Relations, which conducted a random sample telephone survey of 1000 American Muslim registered voters.
The survey results from the report: which found that 8 percent of Muslim Americans consider themselves Republicans.
The post: election analysis by the American Muslim Taskforce on Civil Rights and Elections, which found that only 2.2 percent of registered Muslim American voters voted for Republican John McCain in the 2008 election.
